settings.title: My Self Love Kit

settings.title: complete care box
settings.text: Enjoy a mix of Bella Vita Organic’s natural ayurveda skin and hair care range at a highly affordable price with this versatile beauty box. Choose from a wide range of face washes, skin care, hair care, body care and scrubs. Build your box and say hi to healthy skin and gorgeous hair.

settings.title: the face care box
settings.text: Now build your custom FLEXI BOX with ANY 4 Bella Vita Organic Products of your choice! Forget the hassle of restricting your options and go crazy to pick anything you like. Build yourself a box that completes your entire beauty regime.

settings.title: the summer box
settings.text: Beat the heat with Bella Vita Organic's ultimate summer box. Buy a collection of 5 natural ayurveda products that are the perfect for your skin and body care during the hot months. Select from a variety of options and enjoy your savings.

settings.title: the essential oil box
settings.text: Purify, cleanse, calm, & intensify your surroundings with Pure Essential Oils by Bella Vita Organic. Bring home the goodness of natural plants & flowers that enhance your health, beauty, aura & chakras. Choose your favourites from a variety of oils and Build A Box that you love!
